reviews.review: Amazing puzzle game. It is a classic and it never gets old!
simplemente la secuela de portal, es increibe muy recomendada con buena historia y jugabilidad, que cabe destacar que nunca se vuelve monotona
Great game to play to solve tests :)

This is the best follow up to a puzzle game that I've ever seen! The Portal series as a whole are classics but Portal 2 has got to be the best sequel to a puzzle game ever! With more difficult puzzles and even more hilarious dialogue Portal 2 is one of the best games to ever be released (besides portal one obviously). J.K. Simmons as Cave Johnson was the best choice anyone ever made for hiring an actor.

An absolutely wonderful game and definitely one of my favorites. The story is fun, the characters and their quotes are very well written and memorable, the gameplay itself is spectacular and unique. While the first game, Portal, was a revolution of its own, Portal 2 feels more "alive", expands the world of Aperture Science in many ways, giving the player the ability to have fun with a lot of different things.
Davvero un puzzle game tra i migliori in circolazione. Assolutamente da provare la coop, fatta benissimo!
